resources.string: How do I create a goal?
How do I edit a goal?
How do I remove a goal?
How do the bubbles signify goals?

Click the ‘+’ button on the bottom right corner of the main screen to create a new goal. Add a name for a goal, and rate the importance and expected difficulty of the goal, with 5 being most important/difficult. If desired, add further description. When finished, click the ‘Add Goal’ button to create the goal "bubble" on the main screen.
Click on a bubble to see its name, and click the edit button to update the goal.
Long click on a bubble for options to complete or delete the goal.
The color and size of the bubble will illustrate the goal’s importance and difficulty rating. The larger and darker the bubble equates with a higher the importance and difficulty rating.
